author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Boutique film studio A24 has confirmed the rumored Elden Ring movie adaptation is actually happening, and acclaimed director Alex Garland (Civil War, Ex Machina) will write and direct. George R.R. Martin, who contributed lore and story elements to the game, is coming aboard as a producer, but no story or casting details have been made available. It's also unclear what game director Hidetaka Miyazaki's role will be, if any. In other news, the FTC vs Microsoft trial over the $69-billion-dollar acquisition of Activision Blizzard King may be officially coming to an end. The FTC is dropping its challenge to the ruling, which cleared the way for the industry-shaking deal. And finally, Marvel Studios is shifting its MCU lineup again, pushing back release dates of several projects, including Avengers: Doomsday and Avengers: Secret Wars. They are now slated for December 2026 and December 2027, respectively.

#IGN #Gaming #EldenRing
title: The Elden Ring Movie Is Happening with Alex Garland Directing - IGN Daily Fix

description:
tinyBuild Connect is back! Building on the success of last year's showcase, Connect 2025 will provide a no-fluff, no-talking-heads look at tinyBuild's upcoming games in under 30 minutes. Some of the presented titles will be available via playtests and demos after the showcase.

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description: Watch the latest Police Simulator: Patrol Officers trailer to see what you can expect with the Vehicle Customization Pack. The Vehicle Customization Pack features over 30 different parts and accessories, including spoilers, light bars, rims, and decals that you can use to personalize your department vehicles. The Vehicle Customization Pack for Police Simulator: Patrol Officers is available now on PC, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PS4 (PlayStation 4), and PS5 (PlayStation 5).
title: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Official Vehicle Customization Pack Trailer

author: IGN
description: Elden Ring: Nightreign not only features bosses from the main game and some brand new ones, but it also features bosses from previous FromSoft games as mini bosses that punctuate days one and two. Here's a look at The Duke's Dear Freja, a boss that initially appeared in Dark Souls 2.
title: Elden Ring: Nightreign - The Duke's Dear Freja Gameplay - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Join director David Fincher and creator Tim Miller for a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the 'Can't Stop' animated story from Love, Death and Robots Volume 4. 'Can't Stop' features Red Hot Chili Peppers. Love, Death and Robots Volume 4 is streaming now on Netflix.

Dinosaur gladiators, messianic cats, string-puppet rock stars, it can only be Love, Death & Robots. The fourth volume, presented by Tim Miller (Deadpool, Terminator: Dark Fate) and David Fincher (Mindhunter, The Killer), sees Jennifer Yuh Nelson (Kung Fu Panda 2, Kill Team Kill) return as supervising director for ten startling shorts showcasing the series’ signature, award-winning style of bleeding-edge animation, horror, sci-fi and humor. Buckle up.

The executive producers on Love, Death and Robots Volume 4 are Tim Miller, David Fincher, Jennifer Miller, and Joshua Donen. The supervising director is Jennifer Yuh Nelson.
title: Love, Death and Robots Volume 4 - Official 'Can't Stop' Behind-The-Scenes Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Hellfire Gala: Arakko Map Reveal Trailer for Marvel Rivals, a free-to-play team-based hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players will soon be able to duke it out on a brand new map called Arakko, the sister island to Krakoa. Fight to destroy the technological terror and free Arakko from its mechanical prison. Arakko is launching with Season 2.5 on May 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#MarvelRivals #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Hellfire Gala: Arakko Map Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon is available now on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam). Dive into the dark fantasy world of Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon in this launch trailer for this first-person, open-world RPG. Step into a dark reimagination of Arthurian legends in Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon. Explore a world stuck in everlasting autumn, witness falling legends, and make meaningful choices woven into a complex, branching storyline.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny, the legendary action RPG developed by Capcom. Players can once again relive the dramatic story set in Feudal Japan, fitted with sword-fighting action, fierce battles, and modern features for the game's remaster. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#OnimushaSamuraisDestiny #Gaming #IGN
title: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Spoiler Alert! We dive deep into the emotional and layered ending of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, unpacking its twists, symbolism, and devastating final choices. This isn’t just a recap, it’s a full analysis of what really happens in the final act and what it means for the Dessendre family, the Canvas, and the denizens of Lumiere.
Looking for a complete breakdown of the Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 ending? Whether you choose Maelle or Verso, we’re here to explain both endings, all major story twists, and what it all means in Sandfall Interactive’s powerful narrative RPG.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Ending Explained

author: IGN
description: Bad Cheese is a psychological horror game inspired by the eerie charm of 1920's animation. Hand-drawn art combined with a 16mm film-inspired aesthetic will make you feel like you're watching a scary cartoon from the golden era of animation. Enjoy this latest trailer as Bad Cheese narrows in on a Summer 2025 release window. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3094480/Bad_Cheese/
title: Bad Cheese - Official Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the new May 2025 Game Updates for Nintendo Switch Online, bringing a suite of Game Boy Classics to the Nintendo Switch Online Service. Players can now get access to Survival Kids, Gradius The Interstellar Assault, Kirby's Star Stacker, and The Sword of Hope as part of the Nintendo Switch Online subscription. Gain access to these games now on Nintendo Switch.

#NintendoSwitchOnline #GameBoy #Gaming
title: Nintendo Switch Online: Game Boy Classics - Official May 2025 Game Updates Trailer

author: IGN
description: Brothers Danny & Michael Philippou spent more than a decade building up a following on YouTube as RackaRacka with chaotic content that blends stunts, visual effects, backyard wrestling, and satirical fan fiction. Their lives changed when Talk To Me, their feature directorial debut, sparked a bidding war at Sundance which resulted in the film being acquired and distributed by A24. Now, Danny and Michael are back with Bring Her Back, a psychological horror movie that casts Sally Hawkins as a terrifying foster parent to newly orphaned kids and continues the directors' exploration of trauma and grief. Danny and Michael stopped by IGN to play some of their favorite games - Postal 2, Limbo, and Fuzion Frenzy - and tell us about their improbable road to success. The Philippous also make a disgusting bet, reminisce about brawling on IGN's stage at San Diego Comic-Con in 2023 and mourn having to drop out of directing the upcoming Street Fighter film adaptation in order to make Bring Her Back.
title: Bring Her Back's Philippou Bros. Go Postal Mourning Their Lost Street Fighter Movie | IGN Arcade

author: IGN
description: Check out 12 minutes of gameplay from Etheria: Restart, a turn-based hero strategy RPG set in a virtual world where players become Hyperlinkers — elite summoners who awaken powerful Animus to fight a spreading threat called Genesis. Build squads from multi-attribute heroes, master dynamic turn-based combat, and battle in real-time PvP arenas. Upgrade with customizable Modules and build team synergy for the ultimate force. With epic boss fights and gameplay focused on strategy, competition, collection, and progression, every battle shapes your journey through a world reborn to fight. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2084970/Etheria_Restart/
title: Etheria: Restart – 12 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! We have a full squad this week, with Max Scoville, Logan Plant, and Ryan McCaffrey going over their predictions for each major console's upcoming summer showcases. Nintendo already gave us a showcase when they full unveiled the Switch 2 along with the launch window lineup, but of course Sony and Xbox need to have their time in the sun, too. PS5 has a couple of high-profile games still slated for this year, including Ghost of Yōtei and Marathon. Xbox needs to show off the next project from Double Fine, along with deeper dives on the upcoming Ninja Gaiden 4, the Gears of War remaster, and more. What are you hoping to see from this summer's showcases? Let us know in the comments.

And it's not too late to get tickets for IGN Live! Head over to ign.com/Live and use promo code NGCW for a discount.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Our PS5, Nintendo, Xbox Summer Show Predictions - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: Check out new Zenless Zone Zero gameplay featuring Yixuan, Pan Yinhu, and Ju Fufu! In Version 2.0, players will embark on a brand-new and exciting journey in Waifei Peninsula alongside Yixuan from Yunkui Summit. At Failume Heights, the major city of the new region, players will get to manage the operations of Suibian Temple, forge alliances with fresh faces, and face off fearsome enemies in expanded Hollows. As the adventure deepens, Proxies will further master the ability to control the power of Ether, unlocking new combat potential during Hollow explorations.
title: Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.0 Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
JDM: Japanese Drift Master reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC.

"JDM: Japanese Drift Master is a hugely ambitious and earnest racer that’s very clearly in love with the art of drifting as much as its intended audience is. With its regularly gorgeous and interesting map, robust drift handling, and a mostly licensed car list, it also reset my expectations of the scale that can be achieved by indies in the racing space. Unfortunately, while I had a good time cruising and drifting, the same can’t be said about the unwelcome surprise events that render your drift cars out of their element, or the poorly optimised grip racing mode plagued with clumsy AI. Developer Gaming Factory has promised more modes and fixes over the remainder of 2025 and beyond, but it’s a plan that overtly leaves JDM feeling like an unfinished project that’s shipped without the early access caveat, if you catch my drift."
title: JDM: Japanese Drift Master Review

author: IGN
description:
Join Chris Sanders (the voice of Stitch) for a behind-the-scenes look at Lilo & Stitch in this latest video from the upcoming live-action reimagining of Disney’s 2002 animated classic. Disney's Lilo & Stitch stars Sydney Elizebeth Agudong, Billy Magnussen, Tia Carrere, Hannah Waddingham, Chris Sanders, with Courtney B. Vance, and Zach Galifianakis, and introducing Maia Kealoha. 

Lilo & Stitch follows the story of a lonely Hawaiian girl and the fugitive alien who helps to mend her broken family. The film is directed by Dean Fleischer Camp, with a screenplay by Chris Kekaniokalani Bright and Mike Van Waes. Lilo & Stitch is produced by Jonathan Eirich, p.g.a. and Dan Lin, with Tom Peitzman, Ryan Halprin, Louie Provost, Thomas Schumacher serving as executive producers.

Disney's Lilo & Stitch opens in theaters on May 23, 2025.

#IGN #Movies #Disney
title: Lilo & Stitch - Official 'Booth to Screen' Behind-The-Scenes Clip (2025) Chris Sanders

author: IGN
description:
Doom: The Dark Ages is the newest entry in the legendary Doom series, renowned for its challenging combat and well-hidden secrets. In this Doom: The Dark Ages collectibles video guide, we will show you where to find every collectible. Follow along and reveal every gold piece, ruby, codex, demonic essence upgrade, weapon skin, toy, and secret area.

Don’t miss the secret area and toy in Chapter 11, Hellbreaker. For more Doom: The Dark Ages tips and strategies, head to IGN for our full Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/doom-the-dark-ages

00:00 - Secret Area 1/1
00:10 - Toy 1/1 - Atlan
00:16 - Gold 85/85
00:42 - Armor Upgrade 1/1
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - Chapter 11 Hellbreaker | All Collectibles (Gold, Toys, Upgrades, Secret Areas)

author: IGN
description:
In Claire Obscure: Expedition 33, a unique and elusive group of enemies known as the Mimes awaits discovery throughout the game’s surreal landscapes. These mysterious figures offer some of the most unusual and challenging encounters in the game. In this guide, we’ll break down how to take them on, what makes their battles stand out, and where to find all 16, including those tucked away in secret locations.

00:00 - Intro  
01:50 - Lumiere (Prologue)  
02:58 - Spring Meadows  
04:08 - Flying Waters  
05:19 - Ancient Sanctuary  
06:16 - Esquie's Nest  
07:11 - Yellow Harvest  
09:33 - Frozen Hearts  
13:35 - Old Lumiere  
16:16 - The Continent  
17:24 - Visages  
19:02 - Sirene  
21:10 - Inside the Monolith  
22:37 - The Reacher  
27:48 - Flying Manor  
30:00 - Sunless Cliffs
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - All 16 Mime Locations (All Mime Cosmetics)

author: IGN
description: Watch the Nikke DLC Trailer for Stellar Blade, the hit action melee-based RPG developed by Shift Up. Players can soon access the Nikke DLC based on Goddess of Victory: Nikke bringing players new shooting range mini games, a variety of themed outfits sold by Nikke’s faithful robotic dog, Volt, alongside having Scarlet as a boss from the mobile Nikke game. The Nikke DLC is launching on June 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).
title: Stellar Blade x Nikke - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description: Blades of Fire is available now on Epic Games Store, Xbox, and PS5 (PlayStation 5). Check out the Blades of Fire launch trailer for this action-adventure game. In Blades of Fire, you are Aran de Lira, firstborn of the King’s Ward fighting the forces of the evil Queen Nerea who wields the power to turn steel into stone, rendering all resistance to her tyranny utterly futile.
title: Blades of Fire - Official Launch Trailer
